note: Author, academic, journo, accidental historian, phone snapper #dailypix, parent.   Pen: -Books about journalism, politics and popular cultures and how intertwined from origin to the current day. Last: Journalism and Celebrity (2021) Next: Journalism and Crime (2023) -Features about news, politics and popular cultures and how to improve them.  -Journal articles about digital, political comms and social media.   Argue how we might tackle attack journalism and why it matters to public spheres.
